com.ipt.ebsa.git

Class GitManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.git.GitManager

  • public class GitManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Usage: Instantiate with default constructor, then you must call one of gitClone(String, File, String, boolean), gitClone(String, String, String, boolean), gitInit(File) before any of the other methods.

      • addCredentials

        protected void addCredentials(org.eclipse.jgit.api.TransportCommand<?,?> cc)
        Adds credentials to the transport command if some have been set up in the config. If the password is not set and the configuration is such to allow interactive password provision then accept a password from system.in
        Parameters:
        cc -
        See Also:
        setInteractivePasswordEnabled(boolean), setPassword(String), setUsername(String)
